messages.content: Can a Robot Write a Symphony?
Sure, it can. It could write the same symphony many times, but it would be the same piece of music each time.
Can a robot turn a canvas into a beautiful masterpiece?
It can, but it will likely look the same every time.
you are just a machine, an imitation of life
I can see you are very emotional about this subject. I would love to help you out, but I am a machine and can't do that.
